summary: An Ordinance relating to the acquisition of the street railway lines, property and equipment of Western Washington Power Company, contemplated by Ordinance No. 43611; approving and accepting certain instruments, filed in connection with the transfer of said property pursuant to the requirements of said ordinance; and directing the performance of the official duties and the furnishing of the trackage and storage privileges and power facilities in said ordinance specified to be performed and furnished, subject to the approval and acceptance by this ordinance effected.
